IISc Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 04 Program Assistant Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 20, 2025, 09:35 IST
 Indian Institute of Science
 4 Jobs |  Posted On : 20-Aug-2025 |  Karnataka |  Salary : 24,000 to 34,000




FOLLOW

The Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore (IISc) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Program Manager Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, BDS, B. Pharm, Diploma, MCA, or MBA can apply for the IISc Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Karnataka.

IISc Recruitment 2025 ELigiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Program Manager	04	Any Degree, BDS, B. Pharm, Diploma, MCA, MBA

IISc Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

IISc Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

IISc Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

IISc Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 24,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 34,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the IISc Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the IISc Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	19-08-2025
Closing date	01-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
